DOC.detailed_description: Comparatively studied effect Eye Movement Desensitization Reprocessing ( EMDR ) bilateral brain stimulation trauma therapy . A randomized , parallel , before-after , blind study perform . Thirty nine subject randomly distribute two group : one session EMDR psychotherapy standard EMDR standard protocol without typical brain bilateral stimulation . The result Beck scale anxiety , depression hopelessness impact event test compare group .
